Question
========
Python is best described as:

Answerlist
----------
* A general-purpose language with readable syntax
* A database
* A hardware driver
* A spreadsheet

Solution
========
Python is a general-purpose language known for readability.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
